author: victorcorcino
title: Terra Cognita: AI+Blockchain Gaming
description: There is a lack of exciting, innovative games merging AI and Blockchain concepts in the Cardano ecosystem.
solution: Terra Cognita, an online, cooperative, strategy, RPG game, where players create and set AI/ML based characters to explore a whole new world.
experience: Experienced Full Stack Devs, Plutus & AtalaPRISM Pioneers, Machine Learning Researcher, Designers, Cardano and Gaming Enthusiasts, AIM team.
